yes: Looking to make a purchase, marshal?
Oh, a U.S. marshal, I thought you were all extinct.

responses.text: [MISSION] I'm looking for Chad Erikson, Randy sent me.

dynamic_line: I'm not sure where Mr. Erikson is at right now.

responses.text: Ok, I have to go now.

dynamic_line: There is an arrangement with everyone that lives here, the bottom two floors are a free trade zone and the upper floors are for the alien resistance operation.  We all help them keep the outside defences in place and warn of any zombies or xenoids around the perimeter.  This is the freest market that has ever existed!
I kill monsters, take their loot and sell it here.  This pleases the man upstairs.
I've been scavenging since shit hit the fan, been all over the place, and besides that refugee center, this place feels the most secure.  Plus they like us constantly bringing in new trade goods.
